title: High ping anyone help me?
body: Hello i've been experienceing 100 to 800 ping recently i ussally use to have 35 ping all the time then one day it all suddenly changed can anyone helped me i've already tried command prompt DNS ipconfig/flashdns and it hasent changed anything and i've already done google DNS 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 dose anyone know a soultion to fix this high ping and im using ethernet so my internet is fine

replies.body: Configuring your DNS was a good step to help change your routing.  This network issue might be more concentrated to a local issue, though.  I recommend going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot the instability, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know the results and if it helped improve how your connection is reaching the game server.

ok i've done all of them accept vpn proxy and usage  one and  disable peer to peer updates windows 10 only and  port forwarding i havent done these because  i do not know how to do them but i still lag a bit but my ping (ms) is 35 to 37 now and  my fps is always low goes from 1 to 50 but then somtimes it goes back to 500 or 600 then but rareley but like once or twice a game

It does sound like you're experiencing packet loss in this case.  If the guide hasn't helped, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you to figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
Me to. IM on oce. I usually get 35 ping and now im stuck at 111 ping. please help
